sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for April 3 - 4

event: Games scheduled at 11:00 a.m. and 2:00 p.m. with the final game at 8:00 p.m.
Use added caution if traveling downtown and watch for pedestrians.
Keeneland Spring Meet with first post time at 1:05 p.m.  Use added caution if traveling in the area.
Kentucky Reptile Expo at the Central Bank Center at 10:00 a.m.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as Kentucky state government directives and recommendations.
